title: Stars Remember Funny Actress Catherine O'Hara
summary: Catherine O'Hara, a famous actress from Canada, passed away at age 71. She was known for being very funny in movies like Beetlejuice and Home Alone, and on TV shows like Schitt's Creek. Many celebrities, including Meryl Streep, Pedro Pascal, and Ben Stiller, shared kind words about her. They said she brought joy and laughter to people through her acting. She died at her home in Los Angeles after being sick for a short time. Her friends and co-stars, like Michael Keaton and Macaulay Culkin, said they will miss her a lot. She started her career in Canada and became loved by many for her great performances.
